name: Hell Caretaker
description:
Hello Doc! Welcome to "Hell Caretaker" Here are some brief instructions
if u forgot something:
  1.  You have 4 patients.
  2.  The patients are tough guys so they will not die so easily! They have 3 HP (Hearts) each.
  3. Despite the fact that they are tough, they are in a hard and strange condition.
  4.  There are 5 statuses randomly popping up for them every few seconds and you have 5 tools to treat them.
  5.  HOLD Defibrillator on a patient for some time. Charge and stabilize them while "on the break of death".
  6.  Treat them right and you'll get points, Doc! Treat them wrong and their life will end soon enough.
  7.  Every ALIVE patient gives u 1 point per second (Idle)
  8. Be careful, watch out for the generator. It's old and sometimes you need to kick it! But It'll cost u some points.
Controles
  • LMB: all the game interaction will be with the left mouse button;
  • ESC: pause the game (the menu);
  • 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 keys: changes the active tool (you can do same by click them with LMB)

P.S. I still don't get it, why you like this retro "Snake" mini-game so much? There are only arrow keys to control it and no real goal...

Anyway! That's all for now, Doc. With love, Your "Speaker". Credits

The game is our submission to the Godot Wild Jam #30! and made under 9 days by using Godot Engine 3.2.3.
